body: At least you got lil sis.
The character proportion at page 137 lol

If you read this, your parents will die in five years unless you post this on another manga. Now, YOU don't need to do this. You can just pass this off as spam. I just don't want to take the chance of losing my only parents.

well, my little sister is cute but not in that timid way and only at times. its really great to have someone who shares enough of the upbringing to have quite similar interests. i am almost sure that tensions arise precisely because we actually care about the others opinion

Sister in anime/manga:Cm cute and nice.
Sister in real life: Annoying as fuck and don't find her cute at all.
